duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive, inspect, deplete, manage, and ship inventory for commercial operations in coordination with Operations and Supply Chain.
Provide support to material management groups and quality assurance, with a focus on becoming the SME for Storage and Distribution of Development and Analytical Solutions.
Utilize RF scanners, computers, and QTRAC processes for inventory management, shipping, and material handling techniques.
Stage supplies for Manufacturing groups, communicate with third-party warehouses and vendors, and perform monthly inventory checks to ensure accuracy.
Drive productivity improvements through Lean, 5S, and process improvement tools while maintaining high-quality standards.
Ensure proper documentation, review, and approval of batch documents and steps performed by other operators, while adhering to GMP conditions and applicable SOPs.
Participate in monthly waste events and follow proper protocols for pharmaceutical destruction processes.
Work collectively with Quality Assurance, Operations, Supply Chain, and other necessary areas to ensure timelines are met and results are achieved.
Perform other duties as assigned, including assisting in special projects and process improvement initiatives.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma/GED minimum, plus 3+ years of relatable experience in distribution or shipping. Forklift experience and thorough knowledge of cGMP, FDA, and DEA guidelines preferred.
